name: Invasion Rotation
description:
Invasion Rotation

The aliens are invading! Use your defenses to destroy as many ships as possible. Rotate your craft to match the color of the invading ship to exploit its weaknesses and destroy it, but be careful! Mismatching the colors will damage your weapons.

Controls

Use the arrow keys to move and rotate your ship. Up/down moves your ship vertically. Right/Left rotates your ship clockwise and counter-clockwise respectively.

Credits
  • Game design by Caleb Vatral
  • Music by Sirkoto51
  • All other art by Kenney.nl

Made for the 2021 Kenney Game Jam with the theme of Rotation
